name: Millenniloop
description:
I did two game jams 8 years ago, but I was mainly just the pixel artist/presenter.

This weekend I decided to challenge myself with Ludum Dare 47- to make a game all by myself for the first time ever, using a language I never learned, in a platform I'd never used; Unity.

It went way better than expected! I'm thoroughly happy with how it turned out. There's quite a few things that didn't get implemented, but I think the basic functionality is there.
